001package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service;
002
003import android.os.AsyncTask;
004import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
005import androidx.lifecycle.Lifecycle;
006import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
007import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.dao.PresetDao;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.dao.UserDao;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.entity.Preset;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.entity.User;
012import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
013import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
014import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
015import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
016import java.time.Instant;
017import java.util.ArrayList;
018import java.util.List;
019import javax.inject.Inject;
020import javax.inject.Singleton;
021
022@Singleton
023public class PresetRepository{
024
025
026  private final PresetDao presetDao;
027
028  /**
029   * Initializes this instance by establishing a logical connection to the underlying database.
030   */
031
032  @Inject
033  public PresetRepository(PresetDao presetDao) {
034    this.presetDao = presetDao;
035
036  }
037
038
039  //retrieve currently applied preset
040  public Single<Preset> getCurrent() {
041    return Single.fromSupplier(() -> new Preset()); // FIXME: 10/19/23 Replace with real code.
042  }
043
044  public LiveData<Preset> get(long id) {
045    return presetDao.select(id);
046  }
047  public LiveData<Preset> getByName(String presetname) {
048    return presetDao.selectByName(presetname);
049  }
050
051  public LiveData<List<Preset>> getByUser(long id) {
052    return presetDao.selectUserPresets(id);
053  }
054
055  public LiveData<List<Preset>> getAll() {
056 return  presetDao.selectAllPresets();
057
058
059  }
060
061  //save and update preset method
062  public Single<Long> save(Preset preset) {
063    return (
064        (preset.getId() == 0)
065            ? insert(preset)
066            : update(preset)
067    )
068        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
069  }
070
071  //delete a single preset
072  public Completable delete(Preset preset) {
073return presetDao
074    .delete(preset)
075    .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io())
076    .ignoreElement();
077
078
079
080
081  }
082
083  public Single<Long> insert(Preset preset) {
084    preset.setCreated(Instant.now());
085    return presetDao
086        .insert(preset);
087
088  }
089
090  private Single<Long> update(Preset preset) {
091    return presetDao
092        .update(preset)
093        .map((count) -> preset.getId());
094  }
095private static class deleteAsync extends AsyncTask<Preset, Void, Void> {
096    private PresetDao intermediate;
097    deleteAsync(PresetDao dao){
098      intermediate = dao;
099
100    }
101
102  @Override
103  protected Void doInBackground(final Preset... presets) {
104    intermediate.delete(presets[0]);
105    return null;
106  }
107}
108
109}
